title: Which optional is better for UPSC history or Public administration? - Quora

response.answer_text: a person asking that “is Atlantic ocean is better or Indian ocean is better to swim” (LOL) both the subjects are like oceans, more vast subjects and nowadays UPSC biased towards both the optional so it is impossible to this one is better. but there is another side of the coin that, every year number of candidates qualifying the exam with these subjects there is one simple mantra to choose optional is “YOUR OWN INTEREST” though u studied that subject for 15 days u don’t get bored. that subject will be your optional

Namskar, After writing two mains in History, i feel that upsc is biased against Humanity's subjects while generous to Technical subjects like Languages, Engineering and science stream. Check out scores of selected candidates for last 3 year and you will get clear picture of what I am trying to show. So if possible then choose any technical subject for mains. All the best… Thanks…
